participants.name: Andrew M. Davidson
participants.title: Senior Recruitment, Staffing and Direct Hire Consultant 480-263-3774

messages.message:
For sure! Let me know if you need anything, feel free to send me a resume.
Andrew@empowerstaffinggroup.com
Nice work, Phil Ward is an awesome developer and great guy to work with.
Thank you. :D I really needed this and these guys are all pretty enlightened and level headed.
How is it going at swiftpage?
Good so far. Kind of annoyed with writing unit tests in angular. Similar BS learning curve as with all test suites.
Learning is good. Frustrating, but progress. How is Phil? Team is a good fit?
Phil is really kind. The team is great and really hard working.
Awesome. Well enjoy and say hi to Phil for me.
